title: "Roboticists go off-road to compile data that could train self-driving ATVs"
excerpt: "Researchers from Carnegie Mellon University took an all-terrain vehicle on wild rides through tall grass, loose gravel and mud to gather data about how the ATV interacted with a challenging off-road environment."
